Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Metabolism, Inborn Errors/Purine-Pyrimidine Metabolism, Inborn Errors/Gout/Arthritis, Gouty
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Arthritis, especially of the great toe, as a result of gout. Acute gouty arthritis often is precipitated by trauma, infection, surgery, etc. The initial attacks are usually monoarticular but later attacks are often polyarticular.
